title: Proton už vůbec nejde zrušit
content:
Ahoj, nedávno jsem tady řešil problém, jak přejít zpátky na FF89, protože novější verze jsou stále zmršenější. Tenkrát mi pomohlo následující: V about:config přepnout na false

browser.proton.enabled browser.proton.modals.enabled browser.proton.doorhangers.enabled browser.proton.contextmenus.enabled Jenže ted už to zase nefunguje a FF je zmršený, i když to v konfigu mám pořád stejný. Jde s tím něco dělat?

Jsem zoufalý z toho, jak se kdosi v mozille snaží zničit nejlepší prohlížeč... :(
creator: rojcze

title: Being updated by another instance
content: I am trying to update but it just shows this all the time. I do not want to reset my browser because of all settings and stuff I would have to setup it all again I am afraid.
creator: BrajBliss

title: Help me delete my account
content: I need an email to contact Firefox support, I got locked out from the email connected to my Firefox account and now it's not under my control and I would like to delete it, what can I do ? Please help me soon Is there an email to contact Firefox for such matters? or what should I do?
creator: mycommanon

title: can't change history settings for automatic clearing when closing firefox
content: the history settings will not allow me to check any of the boxes to effect a clear on close of firefox
creator: gestewart204

title: Same problem crashing on shutdown tried every muther....... thing no one knows how to help embarassing!!
creator: fanucweld

title: did not work very aggrevating
content:
Those are crash reports that hang on clearing formdata (Form & Search History). 

   Settings -> Privacy & Security    Firefox will: "Use custom settings for history":    [X] "Clear history when Firefox closes" -> Settings    https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/delete-browsing-search-download-history-firefox

You appear to be clearing quite some data and Firefox takes too long to clear all of this:

"privacy_sanitize_sanitizeOnShutdown": true, "privacy_clearOnShutdown_cookies": false, "privacy_clearOnShutdown_history": true, "privacy_clearOnShutdown_formdata": true, "privacy_clearOnShutdown_downloads": true, "privacy_clearOnShutdown_cache": true, "privacy_clearOnShutdown_sessions": true, "privacy_clearOnShutdown_offlineApps": true, "privacy_clearOnShutdown_siteSettings": true, "privacy_clearOnShutdown_openWindows": false

You can try to clear less data and start with excluding formdata.
creator: fanucweld

title: XULRunner Error "91.2.0 not compatible with min > = 91.0, max < = 91.0
content:
Firefox updated. After updating, whenever I try and load Firefox, I receive the following error message:

"XULRunner

"Error: Platform version '91.0.2' is not compatible with "minVersion > = 91.0 "maxVersion < = 91.0"

I click, "OK" to confirm... and Firefox closes. When I try to update Firefox once more, I receive no response from teh System. When I try to load MaintanceService, I receive no response. What's teh deal here. Any answers?
creator: chudbabies
